SEARCH
Package org.amcp.core

Interface AgentContext

public interface AgentContext
Interface for agent context within the AMCP mesh. Provides methods for agents to interact with the mesh, including publishing events and managing subscriptions.
Since:
1.0.0
Version:
1.5.0
Author:
AMCP Development Team

      topic - the topic to unsubscribe from
